verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will not sleep until I find
Dwelling places for the Mighty One.
I will not sleep until I find
Dwelling places for the Mighty One.
Let us go to Him,
Let us worship Him.
Arise, O Lord.
Let us go to Him,
Let us worship Him.
Arise, O Lord.
For You have chosen Zion,
Land of Your desire.
For You have chosen Zion,
Land of Your desire.
